page.title: 20RECREATION
page.content: {PLAYING FIELDS} The Little Weighton village playing field is about 150 X 125 metres. There is a pavillion with changing rooms for football and cricket teams, etc. There is a new BMX cycle track, 3 climbing frames, swings and a slide. {HORSE RIDING} At Rowley Manor there are stables with 37 horses and ponies. You can have lessons or just hire a pony for a ride. You can learn jumping, walking, trotting, cantering and galloping with the help of an instructor.{ {DRAMA GROUP} Every Tuesday at 20.15 in the village hall. About 20 members enjoy performing pantomimes and plays. They make their own props and costumes. {
